description: I'm a full-stack developer who loves working with new technologies and tinkering with old ones.
I specialise in frontend development, low-level development and software reverse engineering.

projects.title: Chip8 Emulator
description: A small project making use of the Dear  ImGui Graphical interface. This application reads in any chip-8 binary and executes it, displaying the output.
Registers, instruction information and stack information are displayed in customisable windows.
This project used C/C++ as its primary programming language and uses CMake for easy compiling.

projects.title: Spotifriend
description: I created this as a passion project together with a friend. Spotifriend pulls song data from your and your friends' Spotify accounts, selects a random song, and then lets you and your friends guess who listens to it.
This project made use of Python, Spotify public and private APIs, and discord integration through Python.

projects.title: dapoliceman.co.uk
description: A personal website I use to host web-based projects revolving around the destiny 2 API. This site currently hosts 6 projects, each one interacting with the API in a variety of ways.
To make use of the authenticated endpoints, OAuth 2.0 Authentication is implemented on certain projects.
Each project uses the react framework, with various libraries being used in addition to it.
AWS is used for static website hosting, certificates and user storage through AWS lambda.
